item.title: Real Time Control for a DC Motor
item.description: Simulation & real-time control of a Pravalux 24v DC motor (INSA Lyon hands-on)

Control projects realized during my school years (1999-2005) ended-up with simplest PID algorithm tuned through successive trials. Coding for embedded systems require an important effort and left time for modelisation, identification and simulation is often null.
